WRITING.TEXT: That's a scary situation! Thanks, for the advice! I'm going to try to get an appointment to get things checked out.
Thanks for the thoughtful response. Osteoporosis hadn't even crossed my mind until now, and I do have a family history of it.
No risk of pregnancy here unless we're talking immaculate conception. :P Either way, I'm going to bite the bullet give my mom a call tonight (she's a doctor) and get things sorted out.
It definitely is a slippery slope. I'm trying to maintain the perspective that I started working out to become healthy- not to push my body behind health.
